name: DIE (tnaz)
description:
Rock em', sock em', then roll Those guys are dead to me!

Now here we are, way after GMTK 2022...
Initially, I tried finishing up this game for the jam but never had time. I would have probably finished it if I wasn't busy. Too bad! Now here's an extended version with all the features we wanted!

In this game, you are a die that rolls and tries to destroy the other dice. There are red dice protecting your targets.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to roll; Space to Jump
Dash: Left Click, Left Ctrl or Left Shift. (Unlocks on level 6)

The red outline around the player indicates the dash ability's cooldown.

Feedback

For any feedback, join our discord server! https://discord.gg/M6VeTCxdHN
